Package repository

Class PrescriptionRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.Repository
repository.PrescriptionRepository
public class PrescriptionRepository extends Repository
Prescription Repository reads, loads,stores and updates data for all csv files for prescription

    • loadFromCSV

      public boolean loadFromCSV()
      Loads prescription records from a CSV file and sets the repository as loaded.
      Specified by:
      loadFromCSV in class Repository
      Returns:
      true if the records are successfully loaded; false otherwise

    • saveAlltoCSV

      public static boolean saveAlltoCSV()
      Saves all prescription records in the repository to the CSV file.
      Returns:
      true if the save operation is successful

    • savePrescriptionsToCSV

      public static void savePrescriptionsToCSV(String fileName, HashMap<String,Prescription> prescriptionMap)
      Saves the provided prescription records to the specified CSV file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file to save records to
      prescriptionMap - the map of prescription records to save

    • prescriptionToCSV

      private static String prescriptionToCSV(String diagnosisID, Prescription prescription)
      Converts a Prescription object to a CSV-formatted string.
      Parameters:
      diagnosisID - the ID of the diagnosis associated with the prescription
      prescription - the Prescription object to convert
      Returns:
      a CSV-formatted string representing the prescription

    • loadPrescriptionsFromCSV

      private static void loadPrescriptionsFromCSV(String fileName, HashMap<String,Prescription> diagnosisPrescriptionMap)
      Loads prescription records from the specified CSV file, creating an empty file if not found. Records are added to the provided map.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the CSV file to load from
      diagnosisPrescriptionMap - the map to store the loaded prescriptions

    • getDiagnosisIDFromCSV

      private static String getDiagnosisIDFromCSV(String csv)
      Extracts the diagnosis ID from a CSV-formatted string.
      Parameters:
      csv - the CSV string containing the diagnosis ID
      Returns:
      the diagnosis ID extracted from the CSV string

    • csvToPrescription

      private static Prescription csvToPrescription(String csv)
      Converts a CSV-formatted string to a Prescription object.
      Parameters:
      csv - the CSV string representing the Prescription
      Returns:
      a Prescription object, or null if parsing fails

    • setRepoLoaded

      public static void setRepoLoaded(boolean isRepoLoaded)
      Sets the repository load status.
      Parameters:
      isRepoLoaded - true to set the repository as loaded, false otherwise

    • addPrescriptionRecord

      public static void addPrescriptionRecord(Prescription prescription)
      Adds a new Prescription record to the repository and immediately saves the repository state to the CSV file.
